member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.RanorexToolsFilter
member.summary: Provides helpers to filter windows/processes which belong to Ranorex tools of the same Ranorex version.
member.remarks: Only the main module of a process is checked whether it has the Ranorex public key token. I.e. 3rd party tools or user test executables are not filtered even if the show Ranorex controls (like the test suite progress dialog).

member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.Win32Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Win32Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Win32Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Win32Resources.NativeItem
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.
